channel.title: Where can I find zero days and the latest known vulnerabilities?

search for: - CVE - exploits - POCs - 0 days
in order to create a best defence

item.title: Where can I find zero days and the latest known vulnerabilities?
item.dc:creator: Blackraven677
item.description:
sploitus.com

ðŸ’€ Sploitus | Exploits & Tools Search Engine

Sploitus is a convenient central place for identifying the newest exploits and finding attacks that exploit known vulnerabilities. The search engine is also a good resource for finding security and vulnerability discovery tools.

item.source: Where can I find zero days and the latest known vulnerabilities?

item.title: Where can I find zero days and the latest known vulnerabilities?
item.dc:creator: primedev1101
item.description:
I believe that it would be much harder to find 0days since companies would likely patch these things up though if you are just looking for latest exploits or known vulnerabilities, you could check out exploitdb.

Additional info, you could go and checkout twitter and follow legitimate security researchers and companies to get the latest updates.

Read full topic
